page.title: 13NOTABLE EVENTS (CONT)
page.content: and especially for the Womans Support Group in financial terms by {NEWHAM brought about a desire to foster closer links between the two communities of {NORTON}and { {NEWHAM.}Eventually it was decided by the respective councils to enter into a formal twinning agreement between the Borough Council of Newham and the Parish Council of Norton. The formal agreement was signed on the 9th February 1985. Under the terms of the agreement it was agreed to foster and develop mutual understanding,to encourage and assist exchange visits between indiv- iduals and organisations,to promote cultual,sporting and social contacts between the two communities and to encourage and provide the means for mutual support,aid and comfort between the two communities in time of need.
